fieldDescription: Toggles the spawning of additional [Megastructures] exclusive to [Sol]. Requires [new game].
Enables [Pluto] Mining Station. Requires [AoTD - Vaults of Knowledge] to be enabled. Registered [once per save].
Converts [Mars] to a Shipyard World. Requires [AoTD - Vaults of Knowledge] to be enabled. Registered [once per save].
